The most used method for getting service is downloading over the internet, which is a more convenient and faster method. For places where an internet download cannot be used or a physical media is required, IBM still can ship service on DVD. 266 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 To download service by using internet delivery, complete the following steps: 1.
